body: I noticed that in cuda_dnn.cc, there is also an env-var with exactly the same name: TF_DISABLE_TENSOR_OP_MATH. Ideally, we would want each env-var to only control the behavior of one op, this will make debugging easier. Could you consider using two different names such as TF_DISABLE_CUBLAS_TENSOR_OP_MATH and TF_DISABLE_CUDNN_TENSOR_OP_MATH?
